message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Among the options, only hypercalcemia may be found on follow-up testing. Hyperkalemia is more commonly seen in renal hypertension or as a side effect of certain medications. Hypolipidemia and hypouricemia are not typically associated with hypertension.
